name: Cisco | IOS | Vendor | Cisco | IOS | Network | Load Balance | vserver Out of Service #3 (SYSLOG)
description: %CSM_SLB-6-RSERVERSTATE: Module 4 server state changed: server x.x.x.x:443 in serverfarm 'WEB_SEAL2' has reached configured inband health retries
event_class__name: Vendor | Cisco | IOS | Network | Load Balance | vserver Out of Service

patterns.value_re: %CSM_SLB-6-RSERVERSTATE: Module (?P<module>\d+) server state changed: server (?P<name>.+?) in serverfarm '(?P<farm>.+)' has reached configured .+ health retries
